data.title: Sonos - Wake Up The Silent Home -  Dinner
data.description:
Our homes used to be places filled with life, love and music,
but something has changed. Today we find ourselves living in
silent homes. It’s time to fix all that. Learn more at sonos.com/wake-up-the-silent-home

Sonos Your Home

All your music in every room in amazing HiFi sound. Wirelessly.

http://www.sonos.com/system

data.title: Connecting Sonos to a New Router
data.description:
If you’ve recently replaced your router or changed your home WiFi password, your Sonos system may not be working properly. Ryan from Customer Care will guide you through how to get Sonos up and running again, providing instructions for both a Standard Setup and a BOOST Setup.

00:34 — Difference between a Standard Setup and a BOOST Setup
01:23 — Checking your WiFi network
01:53 — Standard Setup instructions
03:13 — BOOST Setup instructions

data.title: Sonos, the Home Sound System
data.description: Sonos is the home sound system that delivers all the music on Earth, in every room, with warm, full-bodied sound that's crystal clear at any volume. Sonos can fill your home with music by combining HiFi sound and rock-solid wireless in a smart system that is easy to set up, control, and expand.

data.title: Setting Up Sonos
data.description:
It takes just a few steps to get Sonos up and running, and Jay from our Customer Care team will guide you through the process from start to finish.

This video walks you through the Sonos setup in four easy steps: 

1) Install the Sonos app and connect to a Sonos player
2) Connect Sonos to your home WiFi network
3) Add any additional Sonos players and tune them with Trueplay
4) Register your system and add a music service to start listening!

asset.title: Setting Up Sonos
asset.description:
It takes just a few steps to get Sonos up and running, and Jay from our Customer Care team will guide you through the process from start to finish.

This video walks you through the Sonos setup in four easy steps: 

1) Install the Sonos app and connect to a Sonos player
2) Connect Sonos to your home WiFi network
3) Add any additional Sonos players and tune them with Trueplay
4) Register your system and add a music service to start listening!

For more information on setting up your Sonos system at home, visit: http://www.sonos.com/support

data.title: How to Set Up Sonos
data.description:
Sonos wireless speakers can now communicate with each other on your home WiFi network, just as they do when on a dedicated wireless network. This means that setting up your Sonos speakers is easier than ever, and your listening experience will stay in perfect sync all over your home, so you never miss a beat.

This video walks you through the Sonos setup in 3 easy steps: 

1) Install the Sonos app and connect to a Sonos player
2) Connect Sonos to your home WiFi network wirelessly 
3) Register your system and start listening!

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Sonos Home Audio products. Shop for the Sonos Play:1 Speaker and the full line of Sonos Home Audio products at Abt!
